title: FS: T200 St. Louis Nationals Poor - $125 SOLD
author: Danny Smith

posts.post_title: FS: T200 St. Louis Nationals Poor - $125 SOLD
posts.post_content:
SOLD!!!

For sale is a very tough t200 St. Louis Nationals for $125 obo  via paypal as a gift. Behind Boston Nationals and NY Americans the two St. Louis cards are the next hardest cards in the set. 

It is in poor condition. It is missing a corner. The front of the card has stains and a smudge. The back has glue residue and a piece of tape which appears to be holding a torn piece on. 

Please email me at [url]smithvintagecards@gmail.com[/url] if interested.
